1.content: you wake up in a weird room, it looks like a bed room" where am i " you say as you look around, all you can remeber is your name. you start to feel a falling feeling, you black out....what happens
1.title: awake,then sleep?!

11.content: you wake back up but every thing is huge , then you realize that you shrunk but how small?
11.title: you shrink,but how small

111.content:
If the size of the paper clip in front of you that's as big as a train is any indication, you were shrunken to a millimeter tall. You were 1/25th of an inch. You let out a high pitched gasp at such a thought. You then step back and then you gasp as you look at the ground. You are standing on what looks like a glass coffee table in somebody's living room. That meant that there was a giant nearby and you had no way of knowing if they were friendly or hostile. Or worse, hungry. You gulp and analyze your surroundings for any possible way to escape. There was no such luck. As you walked to the edge of the table, you saw that the furniture is miles away and a jump would cause you to fall to what would most certainly be your doom.

You hold yourself and try to think of something. After all, it was too early to panic. Maybe the giant wasn't home. But then you hear loud rumbling and then the entire room begins to shake. You gulp because the enormous homeowner was coming into the room. An enormous shadow was cast over you and it was clearly female in shape to your surprise. As you look up you see from the size of the shadow, there were two possibilities; she merely looked like she was 1000ft tall because of your shrunken size or she actually was 1000ft tall but for some reason you were still a millimeter tall so she'd be even bigger.

But then you realized that this giantess wasn't human. She was an enormously large anthropomorphic...
111.title: The 1 Millimeter Man

choices: She Drops You in Her Pouch
She Drops You Between Her Butt Cheeks
1111.content:
The giantess was a giant anthropomorphic kangaroo tens of thousands of times bigger than your millimeter-high self. She was a orange-pink furred kangaroo with short orange-red hair worn in a bob cut and was wearing a skin tight white skirt, purple shirt and white jacket with what looked like an emerald pendant to go with her eyes. She also had freckles. From the looks of it, this kangaroo giantess was very fat with a large protruding belly, F-cup breasts and a large rear. However, she was not too heavy to hop as she proceeded to bounce into the room, creating earthquakes with her every move.

The kangaroo then looks down at you and smiles as you step back. "There you are, you naughty boy," says the colossal kangaroo woman in a scolding tone as she swings her finger from side to side. "Don't you realize how much of a nuisance it is for me to have to look for someone as tiny as you." That kangaroo's voice sounds slightly familiar but then the roo woman holds her stomach and lets out several small belches. "Ugh," she groans. "My stomach has been (burp!) killing me lately. Something is (burp!) wrong with me! Hold on (burp!) sweetie! Mama needs her antacids." The kangaroo giantess begins to root through her pouch and pauses to let out a rather loud fart before she takes out a packet of antacids and pops one the size of a flying saucer to you into her mouth and swallows it.

"Ugh," says the kangaroo giantess with another small burp. "That's a little better. I'm really gassy these days and I can't figure out why." The kangaroo then hiccups and lowers her fingers. You try to run but since you're only a single millimeter tall, the roo's fingers are as big as islands and pick you up and take you to her face. You look up in the face of the enormously big, ginormously fat, gassy kangaroo giantess and you give a face of surprise. Aside from her marsupial features, this titanic kangaroo looked almost identical to your mother.

"You are a naughty boy always getting lost like that," says the kangaroo in your mother's voice. "I guess it's my own fault given how puny you came out. Now, I'm going out and I'm taking you with me so you don't get into any trouble. But where to put you. Aha. I've got it."
1111.title: Big Beautiful Mama Roo

1112.content:
You look forward and see that right in front of you was the crotch level of a pair of enormous blue jeans. The belt of the pair of jeans was a skyscraper’s height above you at your millimeter height. You look closer to see the jeans are women’s jeans, which meant that there was a giant woman in front of you. You know you were shrunken but she looked too big to be normal-sized even if you were only a millimeter high. From the looks of it, she had to be 1000ft tall at least. You then look up to see that this giant woman appeared to have an enormous copper stomach and was scratching it with hands that sure didn’t look like human hands given how rough the nails were. This prompts you to take a closer look and look at the shadow the behemoth lady was casting.

To your surprise, the shadow had a long face with two large horns on the end. The face looked almost like that of a rhinoceros. You then look up and learn that there is a reason for this. The giantess in front of you was a 1000ft tall copper-skinned rhinoceros woman (from the shape of her head and horns, a white rhinoceros) She had long raven black hair and bright red lips. She was very fat with an enormous stomach and multiple chins that made her red jacket look painted on and large breasts so fat that her black shirt only covered the top of them. However, her most prominent feature was her large butt. Sure she was really fat but her butt looked like it was grafted on her from an even larger woman, so much that her jeans were coming apart at the seams. However, the most striking article of clothing on the rhinoceros woman was a large blue diamond ring on her left ring finger. The ring was as big as a stadium at your millimeter high height.

You look up at this impossibly huge rhinoceros woman in pure fear. Rhinos were rather ill-tempered creatures and this one was so big that you were an ant to an ant to an ant to her. And from the looks of it, she was lowering herself to your level. Her massive behind casting a shadow over you and herself, showing her tail wagging from side to side as her moon-sized eye is right above you. It doesn’t look like she’s noticed you and you give a sigh of relief. That makes a lot of sense, given how rhinos have rather poor eyesight. From the looks of it, she’s not going to notice you.

Or that’s what you think, because the next thing you know, the rhinoceros giantess puts on a pair of horn-rimmed glasses to get a better look at you and she spots you immediately. Before you can make a sudden move, you grunt as the rhino giantess picks you up by the shirt and stands up, holding you in front of her smiling face. “Hi, Honey.” She says in a sweet sounding voice. “Honey?” you think to yourself. Before you can say anything, the rhinoceros gives you a massive kiss, narrowly avoiding swallowing you whole and splattering saliva over you as you grunt.

It was then that this massive rhinoceros woman...
1112.title: I Now Pronounce You Man and Rhino

11131.content:
As you’re trying to figure out your surroundings, you hear what sounds like a shower pouring water at a rapid speed. You cover your ears because it almost sounds like a typhoon with all the water rushing at an intense speed. “What is that?” you ask yourself. “It sounds like the world’s biggest shower.” As the water keeps on coming down, you hear it come to a stop from your location on the table. Then you hear a humming sound as the entire room begins to shake. The tremors were enormous and sounded like the footsteps of a giant creature but you couldn’t figure out what kind. You may have somehow been shrunken to only a millimeter high, but whatever that creature was, they had to be 1000ft high. You were an ant to an ant to an ant to them.

It was there the giant’s shadow is case upon you. It’s a large and fat dark shadow that while incredibly round, was clearly that of a woman, albeit an anthropomorphic animal woman, one with a rather big and round nose. You look up and you’re in pure surprise. The woman in front of you is a bright silver-skinned 1000ft tall anthropomorphic manatee woman. She was wearing nothing but a towel and she was so enormously fat that the towel looked tattooed on. Her belly seemed to be even wider than she was tall. She had long red hair reaching down to her big flat-tailed rear and a blue tattoo of a tailfin over her right eye. From the looks of it, the giantess had just gotten out of the shower. You look up in pure shock at the huge manatee woman and step back.

The manatee giantess waved her hair as her body dripped water on the floor and then let out a sigh as she flipped her bright red hair. You have to admit, she was really beautiful. For an enormous manatee so big that you could live underneath her fingernails. Then you realize that you could very well be in danger. After all, you were technically trespassing in this giant woman’s house. You had no idea what she felt about humans. Heck, you were so small that you were a bug to her and it’s unlikely she thought too highly about bugs. Wait. You were so small that a bug to her would be an elephant or even a dinosaur to you. Wait. Maybe your nigh-microscopic size compared to the manatee woman could actually work in your favor.

That point was proven all too wrong because the manatee woman lets out a deep sigh as she’s preparing to use the towel to dry her damp red hair. The manatee’s sigh releases a massive gust of wind that blows you screaming off of the table. Just when you think you’d fall to your doom, you land with a thump on something big and soft. You get up and see that you’re on a bright purple landscape with white floral designs. “Huh?” you ask as you look around. You have no idea where you are, but as it turns out, you’re on one of the cushions of an enormous couch. Unfortunately, as you look up, it turns out that you’re about to learn the hard way where you are as a shadow is once again upon you.

You look back and then scream because the red-haired manatee giantess’s enormous butt is right above you and it’s descending quickly. You try to run but you’re so small, the couch is so ginormous and the manatee woman’s butt is so impossibly huge, that you get nowhere and in seconds, the manatee sits right down, taking up the entire couch and trapping you underneath her massive behind. You moan and scream from underneath the bright silver butt that is sitting atop of you. You guess your extreme size difference is the only thing keeping you from being crushed as the manatee kicks back, not knowing that you’re underneath her.
11131.title: The Huge Manatee

Walking around, you eventually come across some white stone ground as far you can see, up till the massive wall farther up. Nearby, you see a whiter mountain that's oddly shaped and looking up you can see that it resembled a toilet. Putting two and two together, you realize that you have miraculously shrunk in a bathroom. Looking around, you see a door to right, with a gap large enough for you to walk through. Running as fast as you can, you were halfway there, when massive tremors shook the ground, making you fall. Getting up, you see a large figure's shadow behind the door, as the figure stops right at it. A painful moan comes from the other side of it, indicating that the owner was female and very soon, a very wet and loud fart is heard. The door opens revealing a ...

125.content: Where do you awake this time?
125.title: Somewhere else

1251.content: The surface you groggily woke up on this time was much sharper and harder than your​ previous soft mattress. A a bright light accompanied by a cold chill fell over you. Finally being able to muster the strength to stand, you take a look around. In front of you, a large stretch of small grey spikes came to a very steep drop, and beyond it, a grassy field with white patches scattered around, each differing in size. Behind you, the sound of metal jingling together made your ears perk up a bit. You turn around to investigate, only to have a massive door envelope your entire field of vision. To make matters worse, it was opening, and you had no idea what would be coming out of it.
1251.title: Front Porch

choices: She looks down at her foot, finding you.
She lightly shakes her foot. Not taking to much notice to your presence there.
12511.content:
A ginormous humanoid with the body of a human, but covered in orange-red and white fur. But the fur wasn't the only thing unusual about the figure in the doorway, it had the head of a fox! More hair like… hair covered the top of it's head but it was much darker color than the rest of it's body. A dark brown with hints of red. It's hair was cut at shoulder length. It's head didn't give anything away gender wise, unable to tell if this ginormous figure still standing in the door was a male or female, so your eyes drifted downward.

Two large mounds below the neck followed by a skinny, fit abdomen, wide hips, and juicy thighs confirmed that the creature was female. It was wearing what seemed like pajamas, being blue short shorts and a light, white T-SHIRT. She stepped forward, her foot nearly falling on and crushing you.

Thinking it would probably be best to get inside and out of the cold, you dive for the grounded foot trying to grab onto it before it was lifted again. You miss, and the fox girl kept walking to whatever she was walking to. She stopped somewhere in the grass, bending over to pick something up. Giving you a pretty good view of her posterior. When she stood back up, she had a newspaper in hand. She gave a quick glance at the newspaper then started to make her way back towards the threshold.

Once again, her foot fell dangerously close to you. Diving for her foot again, you make it this time. But when you did, the fox girl stopped in her tracks. She must have noticed you.
12511.title: Female Red Fox

choices: You dream about what has happened, and how it happened
Skip, the dream. You wake up with the fox girl over you, watching intently.
125111.content:
Her eyes dart towards the disturbance on her foot. As soon she laid her eyes on you, she went into an immediate state of panic. She violently jerks her foot, sending you flying across the porch. “WHAT THE FUCK IS THAT!?!” She yelled, somehow not gaining the attention of other humanoids like herself. She slowly crept her way towards you, still scared of what she saw. She crouched down, trying to get a better look, most of her panic replaced by intrigue. She lightly pokes you. “Is it… dead?” She asked herself. In critical amounts of pain, you try to get back up, but find yourself unable to lift yourself onto even your knees. The fox girl spoke again. “What. Are you?” She gently picks you up and carries you inside.

You are set down on a cold, smooth surface. You could hear the fox girl rush around to find some sort of medical supplies that would help someone of your stature. She puts something soft under your head, keeping it supported. “Just hold on little guy, I'll get you something to help.” She says, trying to reassure you. The panicky tone in her voice didn't help with that though.

Apparently finding something to help, she dabbed a padded finder over your wounds. It stung, a lot, and it made you flinch. “No no no, stay still, this will help you.” She reassured you. After the first initial pain, whatever she was putting on your body began to feel warm and soothing. Like drinking hot chocolate on a cold winter night. After applying the medicine, everything goes quiet, nothing was moving, nothing was making and hint of a sound. You were left only with your thoughts and the sound of your blood pumping in your ears. You fall asleep, wondering how the hell this all even happened.
125111.title: She looks down at her foot, finding you.

1251112.content:
After regaining consciousness, you grasp your forehead. Having a terrible headache after being thrown around like a rag doll across a giant concrete porch by an exponentially larger fox chick. You felt surprisingly well after the beating you took. You feel a warm, moist, breeze come through. You look in the direction of where it was coming from to see a gigantic muzzle with two big, extremely blue eyes behind it. Panic ensues. “Holy Shit!” You yell as you scramble backwards and away from the muzzle. “No no no wait. You don't need to be scared, I'm not going to hurt you. I promise.” She reassures you, a large toothy grin filling your field of vision. That only scared you more. “No, nuh uh.” You exclaimed, still trying to get to your feet and run away. “Please calm down, you're gonna hurt yourself.” She pleaded. She offered you a hand to climb onto.

For what seemed like hours, you stared at her fur covered, padded hand. Before you finally start to inch your way towards it. When you finally got to it, her hand quickly pulsed outward. Knocking you onto your butt. What is going on?
1251112.title: Skip, the dream.

13.title: a giant woman is over you, what is she

choices: You're recovering from a serious injury
You're the last of your kind
131.content:
As you look up, you see a large figure directly over you, female judging by the two mountains above on the upper chest and very large, especially in the belly. You look up to see the creature is yellow in scale color and appears to have a pair of huge bat like wings and black hair that almost looked blue. She was wearing a black shirt and a pair of jeans and lowers her head to reveal a dragon's face with small horns on her forehead and huge ears.

You look up at this dragon woman and scream at the top of your lungs. "A dragon! Please don't eat me! I taste horrible!" The dragon woman just smiles a toothy grin at you and lets out a laugh. "What's so funny?" "You humans are so adorable when you're frightened," she says in a light feminine voice. "But no, I'm not going to eat you. Besides, you're not that filling." The dragoness stands up and you guess she has to be at least 1000ft tall. "I'm Eliza by the way and you are..." Eliza holds out her palm and you walk up and touch her. "I'm M-Matt."

Eliza smiles at you and picks you up. "Why am I here?" you ask. Eliza lets out a sigh before she explains.
131.title: A Gentle Dragoness

choices: Why are there anthros on this new Earth?
Are there other dragons like you?
Could I see how the world has changed?
1313.content:
Your heart drops at the sound of Eliza's words. "That's a lie!" you yell. Eliza just shakes her head. "I'm afraid it's all too true. Welcome to Earth-Neo, the remnants of the previous Earth. Humans are a dying breed in this new world and I'm afraid you're the last human on this planet. As soon as the anthros came, the humans begun to decline. It's been going on for centuries."

Eliza sits down next to you, causing you to tumble on the bed into one of her large thighs before the dragoness strokes your head with one of her titanic fingers. "How come I don't remember. I remember my family and my school and..." Eliza shushes you and gives a sympathetic look. "Calm down. You're going to be safe Matt. I'm the one the authorities trusted to make sure nothing happens to you. You're lucky, not all anthros are as friendly towards humans as I am.

Eliza then intimidates you unintentionally as she smiles and shows you her teeth big enough to chew apart skyscrapers. You even begin to swear before Eliza lifts you up onto her shoulder with her tail. You begin to shiver but she breathes out some hot air from her mouth to heat you up, which you appreciate.

"Uh Eliza," you say. "Yes Matt?" "I'd like to ask you..."
1313.title: The Last Man

132.content:
You look up and then you see something really shocking. A giant brown skinned African elephant woman with large tusks was looking down at you. She had long white hair and bright blue eyes. She was wearing a white shirt and black jacket with gray shorts that were too tight on her. If she was normal sized, she would no doubt be the size of a sumo wrestler.

Then you look to see that you're in a jar as the elephant woman looks at you. You're also striped down to your boxer shorts. You gasp and then you run at the side of the jar to pound on it. Before you could do anything else, the elephant woman grabs the jar. You look and see that she looked like she was at least a thousand feet tall. Either that or you had been shrunken down so small it looked that way. Even if that was the case however, she'd still be gigantic compared to you.

Then you hear a shuffling noise. The jar is opening. The lid comes off and then the elephant woman lets out a trumpet before she reaches her trunk into the jar. You scream and try to run but she sucks you into her left nostril. You try to get up, but you keep slipping on elephant snot before the elephant woman lifts you up in front of her eye.

You're almost afraid to find out what she has planned for you.
132.title: Elephant Girl

1351.content:
You wait again in the same room, at beginnings its looks the same, but after a pair of seconds where your brain recover all his functions, you starts to notice the odd of your situation, first was the fact that all was gigantic, being the first proof the bed in where you rest. This bed it’s now a vast plateau of hundreds of acres.

Your first reaction it’s stand up and find the reason of your shrunken, but for more hard that you looks, the bed it s only a long desolation where the sheet wrinkles are now dunes.
Far beyond the limits of the bed you start to notice the walls and other furniture of the room, you notice that all of them are made of wood what sadly is in a very bad conditions, filled with humid and fungus, giving to the place a putrid ambient.

Suddenly your investigations are abruptly interrupted for a series of temblors, each of them stronger that the previous. Four first preoccupation it’s can standing up but immediately your mind switch and make you see the obvious.
If this room it’s gigantic logically would be used for a giant, one who was at a few instant of open the door of the room. These thoughts instantly make you start to find a place for hiding but it evident what that its useless.

Without warming the owner of the room enters without any ceremony at the first thing that you notices it’s what s isn’t human at all. Instead she is a gigantic reptile what walk with her hind legs.
The creature fortunately has not spotted your presence, walking directly to one old bureau of what she open a drawer what she cautiously revise. These reaction make you reconsidered your first reaction to the creature what after a more meticulous analyze result be a female.
You quickly are fascinated with her, she is a weird mix between a crocodile and a women, for example she have big scales like any reptile, Her back and tail were covered with armored scales but at the same tame she have boobs and a very feminine hips, her arms and legs were mostly humanoid but her feet and hands were four fingered with pointy claws.
She wears only a scantly bikini what cover very little of her voluptuous body.

Suddenly your watching was interrupted when she finalize her inspection to the bureau for immediately go to the bed . Without any kind of plan you simply run but it’s evident that that don’t will save you.

Soon the green giantess suddenly gives a loud scream.

-What the hell it’s that!

What make her immediately respond with…
1351.title: The green Lady.

choices: ... You had a serious accident and have been placed under my care."
1352.content:
Looking upwards, you nearly cry out in shock as you see a massive being with white fur standing directly overhead. It was obviously female, which you knew thanks to the massive twin globes adorning its chest, which we so large they completely obscured anything beyond them. Looking back down, you realise that the creature also has hooves, which seem to be a suitable size for the Titan.

Suddenly, the creature leans all the way down to the ground, positioning its breasts so they do not accidentally crush you. You look up into its face, not sure what to think. The creature's head was that of a horse, but...

A long, somewhat thin spike sprouted from the middle of its head. So, not only were you dealing with a gigantic anthropomorphic horse, but she also happened to be a unicorn. As you begin to slowly shuffle backwards, you realise she has a pair of short jeans on, yet no top. Her fur was probably sufficient enough to cover anything up.

As she begins to open her mouth, your brain enters panic mode. "Please don't eat me! I, I, I taste terrible! Yeah, that's it, I taste horrible!" Pausing to look at the unicorn, you realise she was smiling, but it wasn't a sadistic grin.

The unicorn covers her mouth, her laughter easily audible from behind it. She looks down at you and grins again. "Sorry, but you humans are so cute when you're scared of something bigger than you." As her somewhat soft, (though still loud.) feminine voice reaches your ears, she reaches out with a furred hand, black keratin nails tipping her fingers. At an estimated height of three thousand feet, she stands back up to her full height with you in hand.

"Heh, you probably want to know why you're here, don't you, little guy? Well, the answer is...
1352.title: Unicorn

1353.content: Is she one of these?
1353.title: Something Else

1353221.content:
You look and see a huge shadow and then you raise your head and gasp because you were looking at a giant woman who had to be 1000ft tall. However, this giant woman wasn't exactly normal. Why was that? Because she was a huge silvery skin hippopotamus woman. As such she was extremely obese, she had to be 1500ft wide, especially in her gigantic thighs and big booty. She also had large F cup breasts and a belly bigger than any mountain you could think of.

For clothing she was wearing nothing more than a black shirt and gray jeans that were coming apart at the seams, showing her black panties. She also had a pierced navel along with one pierced novel and a pierced lip. She had long black hair reaching to her colossal butt and purple eyeshadow. There was even a skull tattoo on her left breast. You look in show as the hippo woman smiles at you.

"Wakey, wakey." She says jokingly as she reaches down for you. You try to run but the hippo giantess easily picks you up as she smiled and giggled. "As, you're so cute little guy. Lucky for you, I just adore humans. They're so cute, I could just eat them up. The hippo woman opens her big mouth, showing you her skyscraper sized giant fangs and you look down the black hole that is her throat. You tremble. "Please don't eat me!" You yell. The hippo girl then shuts her mouth and smiles lustfully before she decides to place you...
1353221.title: Hippo Beauty

choices: Nope, she's taking the scenic route!
13532212.content:
"Calm down, sweetie, I'm not gonna eat ya. If I saw you as a snack, why waste time talking to you, right?" Your obese captress says with a smirk, tossing her black hair. The motion carries down to her chest, sending a wave through her gargantuan cleavage.

Despite still being terrified (just where did this titaness come from, anyway?!), you have to admit she has a point. "Er, r-r-right, Miss." You answer, chuckling nervously. Wiping sweat from your brow you continue, "So, um...if you could let me go...wait, what the---NO! WAIT, NOOO!"

Your terror returns full force once more, but this time the hippo-woman hasn't opened her mouth. No: she's moving you behind her back....towards her impossibly massive behind that looks like it could crush half a city to powder. And she was moving you toward it, torn pants and black panties filling your view. It didn't take a genius to figure out what was coming.

"Let you go? Nah, you're too cute. Besides, how can I pass up a free pet?" The hippo-giantess's chipper voice thunders from above, as she uses her free hand to pull back the elastic on an exposed patch of her black panties...and lower you into the gap. "And you get a real nice view for the trip home! And don't worry about bothering me if you squirm around...it feels like a massage, really."

With that,she lets go of her panties, giggling as the elastics SNAPS back into place, pinning you to her right rump-cheek. Though she was standing up, the tight fit of her panties, coupled with the sheer size of her rear pinned you so firmly; held so tightly, that she may as well have been sitting on you. You could barely even struggle, all your attempts at flailing around came out as little twitches and squirms that only brought giggles from your pachydermic captress.

The sway of her massive hips wasn't to pleasant either...you were starting to feel a bit queasy.

All you could do was hope to goodness that it wouldn't be a long walk back to her home.....
13532212.title: Hellish Hippo Hips (Or, Pachyderm Posterior Pain)
